nodes.text: Carn Truuvik was a male criminal who worked with Catrinna and several other beings loyal to him during the Galactic Civil War. The group conned targets out of their credits through rigged sabacc games, which they ran at a cantina Truuvik owned named Bovo's, near the Treasure Ship Row, a street in the Blue Sector of Coronet City, capital of the planet Corellia.
